article.title: Raytheon Receives Transceiver Contract
article.author: George Seffers

tags.tag: Identification at Range Integrated Sensor Program

article.text: Raytheon Company, El Segundo, California, is being awarded a more than $14 million contract for modeling, building and testing of a single channel transceiver to demonstrate improvements in the Identification at Range Integrated Sensor Program. U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
